statements: SELECT * FROM Pharmaceutical_Distribution;
SELECT company_name, drug_name FROM Pharmaceutical_Distribution WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT distribution_location, distribution_date FROM Pharmaceutical_Distribution ORDER BY distribution_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Pharmaceutical_Distribution WHERE drug_name LIKE 'Aspirin%';
SELECT company_name, COUNT(drug_id) AS total_drugs FROM Pharmaceutical_Distribution GROUP BY company_name;
SELECT company_name, drug_name, distribution_date FROM Pharmaceutical_Distribution WHERE company_id = 1 ORDER BY distribution_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, drug_name, distribution_location FROM Pharmaceutical_Distribution WHERE distribution_location = 'New York';
SELECT company_name, drug_name, distribution_date FROM Pharmaceutical_Distribution WHERE distribution_location = 'Los Angeles' AND company_id = 2;
SELECT company_name, drug_name, distribution_date FROM Pharmaceutical_Distribution WHERE company_id IN (2, 3, 4) ORDER BY distribution_date ASC;
SELECT company_name, drug_name, distribution_location FROM Pharmaceutical_Distribution WHERE company_id = 3 AND drug_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_companies;
SELECT company_id, company_name FROM pharmaceutical_companies;
SELECT company_name, company_address FROM pharmaceutical_companies WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM drug_distribution ORDER BY distribution_id DESC;
SELECT company_name, drug_name, quantity FROM pharmaceutical_companies JOIN drug_distribution ON pharmaceutical_companies.company_id = drug_distribution.company_id;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_companies;
SELECT company_name, company_address FROM pharmaceutical_companies;
SELECT company_name, COUNT(*) as total_drugs FROM pharmaceutical_companies JOIN drug_distribution ON pharmaceutical_companies.company_id = drug_distribution.company_id GROUP BY company_name;
SELECT drug_name, quantity, company_name FROM drug_distribution JOIN pharmaceutical_companies ON drug_distribution.company_id = pharmaceutical_companies.company_id ORDER BY quantity DESC;

SELECT company_name, AVG(quantity) as avg_quantity FROM drug_distribution JOIN pharmaceutical_companies ON drug_distribution.company_id = pharmaceutical_companies.company_id GROUP BY company_name HAVING AVG(quantity) > 50;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_companies;
SELECT company_name, headquarters_address FROM pharmaceutical_companies;
SELECT drug_name, production_date FROM drugs;
SELECT company_id, drug_id, quantity FROM distribution;
SELECT distribution_id, company_id, distribution_date FROM distribution;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_companies WHERE company_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT drug_name, production_date FROM drugs WHERE expiration_date < DATE('2023-01-01');
SELECT company_name, headquarters_address, contact_number FROM pharmaceutical_companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT drug_name, quantity FROM drugs JOIN distribution ON drugs.drug_id = distribution.drug_id WHERE distribution.quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM distribution WHERE distribution_date BETWEEN DATE('2022-01-01') AND DATE('2023-01-01');
SELECT * FROM PharmaceuticalCompanies;
SELECT company_name FROM PharmaceuticalCompanies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT drug_name, quantity FROM Drugs JOIN DrugDistribution ON Drugs.drug_id = DrugDistribution.drug_id WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT drug_name, regulation_details FROM Drugs JOIN RegulatoryOversight ON Drugs.company_id = RegulatoryOversight.company_id;
SELECT * FROM DrugDistribution WHERE distribution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Drugs;
SELECT drug_name, company_id FROM Drugs ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT company_name FROM PharmaceuticalCompanies WHERE company_id = 3;
SELECT drug_name, quantity, distribution_date FROM DrugDistribution WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY distribution_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, regulation_details FROM PharmaceuticalCompanies JOIN RegulatoryOversight ON PharmaceuticalCompanies.company_id = RegulatoryOversight.company_id;
SELECT * FROM Drug
SELECT drug_name, expiration_date FROM Drug WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT distributor_name, location FROM Distributor
SELECT company_name, headquarters_location FROM PharmaceuticalCompany
SELECT agency_name, location FROM RegulatoryAgency
SELECT * FROM PharmaceuticalCompany;
SELECT company_name, headquarters_location FROM PharmaceuticalCompany ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT drug_name, expiration_date FROM Drug WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT distributor_name, location FROM Distributor WHERE location LIKE '%USA%';

SELECT shipment_id, drug_name, distributor_name, shipment_date, quantity FROM Shipment JOIN Drug ON Shipment.drug_id = Drug.drug_id JOIN Distributor ON Shipment.distributor_id = Distributor.distributor_id ORDER BY shipment_date ASC;
